text: Ed Sheeran is opening up about his secret struggle with substance abuse.The award winning singer spoke about his troubles on a British talk show.Sheeran admits he fell into the pitfalls of fame, particularly drinking.The 26-year-old says he took a year off from the music industry to get himself back on track.He credits music and his girlfriend for saving him, saying he's cut down on drinking.----------
